name: Nari
dialog: Mom, Dad! We're here.
비고: 배에서 내린 나리와 주인공이 나리의 집으로 이동하여 나리 가족을 만난다.

name: Woody
dialog: Great, come on in. We've been waiting for you.

name: 주인공
dialog: Hello! I'm P_name, Nari's friend.

name: Sunny
dialog: Nice to meet you, P_name! Is this your first visit to our Acorn Village?

name: 주인공
dialog: Yes, I'm really excited to explore the village.

name: Sunny
dialog: Hoho, you can look forward to it. Shall we start exploring the village?

name: Sunny
dialog: The first place I'd like to introduce is the restaurant I run.
비고: 써니, 주인공, 나리가 마을 구경을 위해 집을 나선다..

name: 주인공
dialog: Oh? It's a restaurant that serves bibimbap.

name: Sunny
dialog: Our Acorn Village friends love bibimbap, so I opened a bibimbap restaurant. That's why I'm making bibimbap.

name: 주인공
dialog: I love bibimbap too! It's a healthy meal with all the nutrients, right?

name: Sunny
dialog: That's right! P_name, if you ever want bibimbap, just come by..

name: Sunny
dialog: And we also have a special event in our restaurant where you can play the bibimbap-making game. You should definitely try it.

name: Sunny
dialog: Now, shall we move on to the next place?

name: 주인공
dialog: Let's go to the second location!

name: Sunny
dialog: The second place I'd like to introduce is where firewood is prepared. To keep our Acorn Village friends warm during the winter, Nari's dad is chopping firewood here.

name: 주인공
dialog: Wow! There are so many firewood logs here. Thanks to these firewood logs, we can stay warm in the winter.

name: Sunny
dialog: Exactly, we need to prepare plenty of firewood before winter arrives.

name: Sunny
dialog: There's also a firewood chopping game here, so don't hesitate to give it a try. But be warned, it's not as easy as you might think. Now, shall we visit the last place?

name: 주인공
dialog: Let's go to the last place!

name: Sunny
dialog: Ta-da! The last place I want to introduce is this tree. This tree is the largest in our Acorn Village and is a precious symbol of our village. Isn't it impressive?

name: 주인공
dialog: Wow! The tree is really huge! And it has so many fruits hanging from it. Having such a magnificent tree makes Acorn Village shine even more.

name: Sunny
dialog: Ohoho, really? Our village friends cherish and love this tree very much.

name: Sunny
dialog: Oh, by the way! This tree gives a special gift. It's called the fruit-picking game, where you can pick as many fruits as you want in the game. You should try this game too.

name: 주인공
dialog: Sure, I'll definitely check it out. Thank you for showing me around the village today and introducing these fun games. I'll visit often.

name: Sunny
dialog: You're welcome! We always welcome P_name, so feel free to come by anytime.

name: end
dialog: end
